body:
**Uh oh!** It appears that you have made a post with an Imgur/ImgBB post link, rather than a direct image link.

Please note that you should attach the direct image link to the post so the users can see the image without opening it in the new tab.

*Hint: Direct image links start with `i.imgur.com` or `i.ibb.co`; to get a direct link, right-click the image and press "Copy image URL".*

<sup>Hi, I am a bot. If you have questions or feedback, please make a post in +ImageDirectLinkBot. Thank you for your time.</sup>
body_html:
Uh oh! It appears that you have made a post with an Imgur/ImgBB post link, rather than a direct image link.

Please note that you should attach the direct image link to the post so the users can see the image without opening it in the new tab.

Hint: Direct image links start with i.imgur.com or i.ibb.co; to get a direct link, right-click the image and press "Copy image URL".

Hi, I am a bot. If you have questions or feedback, please make a post in +ImageDirectLinkBot. Thank you for your time.

guild.description: The "Yes Chad" meme, also known as "Nordic Gamer", typically depicts a weird-looking person attempting to mock someone for their interests, beliefs or traits. The person being mocked then responds, "Yes".
guild.description_html: The "Yes Chad" meme, also known as "Nordic Gamer", typically depicts a weird-looking person attempting to mock someone for their interests, beliefs or traits. The person being mocked then responds, "Yes".
guild.name: YesChad
